description:
miniature Mauser rifle; neck and barrel carved with cross-hatch design; trigger housing and sight base carved with scrolled leaves; ram carved on trigger housing; starburst carved at bottom of neck; arrived in oak and leather case with green felt lining and brown canvas cover; case has 6 compartments with removable lids, four tools, and one brass oil container; g:brown canvas case. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
title: British Style Miniature Bolt-Action Rifle
